name: Somah
descriptions: Somah is a former slaver from the Capital Wasteland that was abducted by the Zetans and held aboard Mothership Zeta in the Fallout 3 add-on Mothership Zeta.

One of the few post-War wastelanders still left alive in the aliens' captivity by 2277, Somah was originally abducted after picking up the radio signal broadcast by the downed recon craft Theta in the Capital Wasteland and attempted to find the source to scrap it for parts.
Prior to her abduction, Somah was a slaver associated with the organization at Paradise Falls with a tenacity for tinkering with machines and stripping tech from scrap.

If still alive after completing This Galaxy Ain't Big Enough, Somah shares her plans of heading back to the wasteland with some equipment from the ship and finding a new place to make a life for herself. She mentions they likely will not see each other again but expresses her thanks for the player character's help.

After completing Not of This World and reaching the engineering core, she will repair the player character's items, but insists she be paid for her services. Somah's Repair skill is based on one's level and reaches 100 at level 15, giving her the highest non-player character Repair skill in the game.
Somah appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Mothership Zeta.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, I can see that. I'll get us through.
topics.response_text: Okay, okay. Just trying to lend a hand.Play soundDlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahchoi_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahchoi_00005ae5_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I'm open to suggestions.
topics.response_text: Hmmm, maybe we could destroy a section of the assembly line and punch through to the next room.Play soundDlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahchoi_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahchoi_000039b3_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Get a move on it!
topics.response_text: Got it.Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeinte_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeinte_000055cc_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Status report?
topics.response_text: Who the hell knows, these controls are just a mess.Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a936_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What's this thing do?
topics.response_text: Hmm, looks like I'm at the helm.  I'll have these controls figured out in no time at all.Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_000055cf_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Since you seem so familiar with my gear, do you know how to repair it?
topics.response_text: Actually, I do. I used to tinker with all sorts of junk back home.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f9_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Well, given the circumstances, doesn't that seem kind of pointless?
topics.response_text: Maybe to you it does, but hey... I gotta think about the future. If we get back down there and I'm broke, how am I going to survive?Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f7_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Yeah, fine, whatever. Just take a look.
topics.response_text: Sure, I'd be glad to.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055fd_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You've got to be kidding me.
topics.response_text: Oh come off it, kid. If and when we get off this ship, I'm going to need something to keep me alive down there.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055fc_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Yeah, I guess you're right.
topics.response_text: Good, I'm glad we see eye to eye. Now, let me see what you need fixed.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f3_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: No way, Somah. This is ridiculous.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself. Maybe you can ask one of the aliens to help you. Or, when you come to your senses, you can ask me.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f8_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: No way.
topics.response_text: Fine. I'll be waiting for you to change your mind when your equipment starts to fall apart.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055ff_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Fine, I give in. I'll pay.
topics.response_text: All right. Let me see what you have.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlsoma_000055f4_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I'm not looking for a sidekick, okay? I just want to get out of here.
topics.response_text: Sidekick? Who the hell said anything about a sidekick?Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_0000292a_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What kind of advantage?
topics.response_text: They're keeping an eye on us, you know? Watching us. So I say we give 'em a little show.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_0000292f_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You have a plan, or are you just making this up?
topics.response_text: A little of both. It's always worked for me in the past, no reason to second guess it now.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahadva_00002927_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You're kidding me. That's the best you've got?
topics.response_text: Yeah, that's what I've got. I don't see you coming up with anything brilliant, Mr. I've Been Here Five Whole Minutes.

topics.topic_text: Okay, so we get out of this cell, and then what?
topics.response_text: Hell if I know. But at least it's a start. It's better than sitting here waiting for them to experiment on us even more.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002929_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You really think this will work?
topics.response_text: I think it's worth a try. What's the worst that could happen? Nothing changes, only we've got a few more bruises. Big deal. Let's give it a shot.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002939_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: This is stupid. There must be another way out.
topics.response_text: Are you kidding me? Kid, I've looked. Trust me. Ain't no other way out of this little box they got us in.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002930_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: How do I know I can trust you? What if you try to kill me?
topics.response_text: You've gotta be kidding me. You always this paranoid?Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002934_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: So if I kill you, that'll bring the guards?
topics.response_text: Hey, whoa now. Let's not go down that road, sweetie.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000292b_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Okay, let's give it a try.
topics.response_text: All right, good girl.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002935_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: If we're lucky, a friend of mine might show up to help.
topics.response_text: Uhh... okay... So, does that mean you're in?Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000abbf_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Okay, go ahead and hit me.
topics.response_text: All right. I'll hold back on you, make sure you don't get too roughed up, okay?Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002933_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: No, I'm not going to fight you.
topics.response_text: You gotta be kidding me. You've already looked, haven't you? You know there's no way out.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahfigh_0000293d_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: This has to be a bad dream...
topics.response_text: Yeah? Well then wake the hell up, 'cause I'm tired of being stuck in it.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002937_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Who are you? What are you doing here?
topics.response_text: Me? I'm the same as you, I figure. Went pokin' around someplace I shouldn't have, and now I'm payin' for it.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002931_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: This can't be happening. I mean... aliens?
topics.response_text: Crazy, ain't it? I thought I'd seen some shit out there in the Wastes, but nothin' like this.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_0000292c_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I have to get out of here.
topics.response_text: You and me both, kid.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00002926_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Stay back! Stay away from me!
topics.response_text: Whoa, whoa. Settle down there, kid. I'm not gonna hurt you.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00004…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_0000409f_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You're the one with the plan.
topics.response_text: Plan? Yeah, we just used my plan. It got us out of our cell.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006dde_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Do you have any idea where we are, or how to get back home?
topics.response_text: Not a clue. I'm hoping we can get some answers once we get out of this place.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006de2_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I'll take over from here.
topics.response_text: Oh really? Suddenly you have all the answers?Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahgree_00006ddd_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: All right, fine. What's your plan?
topics.response_text: They want us alive for... something. Who knows what. Point is, if it looks like one of us is gonna kill the other, they'll step in to stop it.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahplan_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahplan_00002938_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Why don't you tell me what you have in mind, and I'll think it over.
topics.response_text: Oh, sure. Take your time. No rush, not like we're about to be sliced and diced by... who the hell knows what.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahplan_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahplan_00002928_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: So how do we get out of here?
topics.response_text: I've been here for a little while, but haven't found a way to...Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000683a_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Who are you, and why are you in here with me?
topics.response_text: You've got it all wrong, kid. You're in here with me. This is my little slice of heaven, not yours.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_00002932_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What do they want with us?
topics.response_text: Your guess is as good as mine. I can't understand what they're saying. I don't remember half of what they did to me, and that might be a good thing.Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_00002…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000293c_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What the hell was that thing? Where are they taking that guy?
topics.response_text: What, you've never seen a giant metal claw scoop somebody up and carry him off to who-knows-where?Play soundDlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz1_dlc05mz1somahtalk_0000683b_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Hey, it's okay. You can tell me anything. I won't judge you.
topics.response_text: Well listen, it's not like I even wanted to be there, okay?Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abef_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Forget I said anything.
topics.response_text: Already forgotten. Let's just get back to the whole "not getting killed by crazy space men" thing.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abea_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: There must be a reason you don't want to talk about yourself. What is it?
topics.response_text: A reason? Yeah, there's a reason. It's because I worked for slavers, okay? I worked for them, I helped them, and sometimes I liked it.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abed_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I found this recording... Sounds like you regret something you did.
topics.response_text: Oh, great.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2somahback_0000abee_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Tell me how you were captured by these aliens.
topics.response_text: Not much to tell. I heard that radio signal, thought I'd check it out.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00007e56_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What do you think the aliens want with us?
topics.response_text: Hell if I know. I don't plan on starting a conversation to ask, you know?Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab98_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me more about where you're from?
topics.response_text: Does it really matter?{defensive}Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_00007e55_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I need some help in the Robot Assembly area. You in?
topics.response_text: Well, I would have been helpful, but seems like you already did plenty of damage in there.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpass_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpass_00003999_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I need to get through the Cryo Labs. Think you can help me?
topics.response_text: I was never very good at the science stuff. But let me know if you need me to fix anything... that's my specialty.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpcry_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpcry_00003995_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I may need an extra gun in the Hangar Bay. Can you lend a hand?
topics.response_text: Guns were never quite my thing. There were... let's just say there were other folks to take care of that.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelphan_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelphan_00003991_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You think anything in here can prove useful?
topics.response_text: Well, if this is where they make the robots, we may be able to discover some way to weaken or control them.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelhe_00008…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelhe_00008aba_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I think you should remain in the Engineering Core for now.
topics.response_text: Putting me on guard duty, huh? Swell.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlnevermi_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlnevermi_0000398b_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I don't see that Kago fellow.
topics.response_text: Huh, how about that. He's gone. I didn't even notice.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_0000abae_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What the hell was that?
topics.response_text: Pretty obvious, wasn't it? They're putting on a big show, trying to scare us.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b4_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I have no idea what he said, but he sounded pretty angry.
topics.response_text: Oh, come on. You don't need to understand it to get the point.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b6_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: We need to find out what that was, and put a stop to it.
topics.response_text: Yeah, sure. No question about that.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076bc_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Now we take over the ship.
topics.response_text: Okay, if you say so. Lead the way, kid.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_0000573e_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I'm flying by the seat of my pants here.
topics.response_text: Ha ha. Very funny.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_0000573b_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I was hoping you'd know what to do next.
topics.response_text: Kid, I think I made it pretty clear that my advice became irrelevant once we got out of that cell they stuck us in.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3somahgree_0000573d_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Thanks for your help. Couldn't have done it without you.
topics.response_text: That's right! If it weren't for me, you'd be sitting in a holding cell or lying on some crazy operating table right now.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05postgreet1_0000a7…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05postgreet1_0000a74d_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What will you do now?
topics.response_text: I'm gonna see about getting off this thing. Head back to the Wasteland with some new toys, maybe carve out a place for myself.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a7…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a74f_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: This has been a hell of a ride, hasn't it?
topics.response_text: Yeah, that's one way of putting it. Not really something I'm interested in doing again.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05postgreet3_0000ab…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05postgreet3_0000ab4e_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: DLC05SomahHolo1
topics.response_text: {ALIEN}Play soundDlc05gener_dlc05somahholo1_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05gener_dlc05somahholo1_0000abc0_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Why can't I use the door to get off the bridge?
topics.response_text: Probably means the rest of the ship is so badly damaged that it decompressed. My guess is you don't WANT to open that door.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05tlbridgedoo_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05tlbridgedoo_0000abf4_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: What do you need?Play soundDlc05bridgeld_greeting_000055cd_…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridgeld_greeting_000055cd_1.oggnoicon

conversation.response_text: This place is incredible. Can you imagine having stuff like this in the Wasteland? You'd even be a match for the Brotherhood of Steel.Play soundDlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahcomm_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahcomm_00009a13_1.oggnoicon

Wow! That thing really blew up! I'm going to hang back here until you clear out the next room.Play soundDlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahexpl_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahexpl_00005145_1.oggnoicon

That's got to be the generator. Let's destroy it and get back to the engine core.Play soundDlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahgene_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahgene_00009c67_1.oggnoicon

There! That ought to give the aliens something to think about. Now let's get the hell out of here.Play soundDlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahgene_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahgene_00009c66_1.oggnoicon
Once that core gets exposed, blast it!Play soundDlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahgene_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahgene_00009c68_1.oggnoicon

Well, isn't this fancy, all these shiny machines and such. Gotta find a generator, huh? Let's see... How about we start with that teleporter thing?Play soundDlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahinit_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahinit_0000997c_1.oggnoicon

I'm not totally sure what I'm doing here, but I'll try and tinker with it. You just make sure I don't get shot, okay?Play soundDlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahtele_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05asm_dlc05asmsomahtele_00003714_1.oggnoicon
They hit something big! Shields and Elliott are down!Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeelli_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeelli_00006c81_1.oggnoicon
